name: Quicko Pro
tagline: Practice management software for accountants
description: An AI-first platform, Quicko Pro helps professionals run their advisory online. With customisable storefront, integrated payments, and real-time analytics, it simplifies operations and improves customer engagement.

name: Runway Aleph
tagline: A new way to edit, transform and generate video
description: Aleph is a cutting-edge in-context video model that can edit videos by adding, removing, or transforming objects, changing style, lighting, and even generating new angles—all from a single input video.

name: Ship Happens
tagline: Create, translate, & upload screenshots/metadata for apps
description: Ship Happens helps indie devs launch faster by removing the tedious parts of App Store updates. No more wasting time on translations or screenshots—just drag, drop, translate, and ship. Focus on building your app, not battling App Store Connect.

name: Qwen3-235B-A22B-Thinking-2507
tagline: Qwen's most advanced reasoning model yet
description: Qwen3-235B-A22B-Thinking-2507 is a powerful open-source MoE model (22B active) built for deep reasoning. It achieves SOTA results on agentic tasks, supports a 256K context, and is available on Hugging Face and via API.

name: Shuffle CLI
tagline: Stunning UIs in Shuffle, full control in Cursor
description: Create stunning UIs in Shuffle, then take full control with Cursor. Sync projects locally and accelerate your workflow — all powered by the Shuffle CLI.

name: Higgsfield Steal
tagline: Recreate ANY picture from anywhere on the web
description: Select any image from the web and, with one click, generate a similar visual - no prompt needed. Higgsfield captures the outfit, pose, and vibe to recreate stunning results, from streetwear to cinematic portraits

name: The Catipede
tagline: An emoji-based online game inspired by Tamagotchi.
description: Feed the catipede by giving it food. The Catipede is an emoji-based online game inspired by Tamagotchi.

name: Tough Tongue AI 3.0
tagline: Agentic AI roleplay for high-stakes conversations
description: What’s new in Tough Tongue AI 3.0? • Hyper‑realistic roleplays with multiple voices and agentic tools - cards, whiteboard & code editor • Topic‑focused Coach that remembers every session and fine‑tunes feedback. More advanced post-session evaluation.

name: LyfeLog
tagline: Speak Your Mind, Transform Your Lyfe
description: Transform your thoughts into insights with AI-powered voice journaling

name: JustRef
tagline: AI Referee for Sports
description: JustRef is a platform that uses AI to analyze and provide referee decisions.

name: Find local AI in 10 secs with Suverenum
tagline: Did you know AI can run privately on your laptop?
description: Choosing from 10,000+ AI models feels like reading a medical prescription (Q4, GGUF, 13B?). Here's a simple tool that detects your hardware and prescribes the perfect local AI. No jargon, no confusion. Private AI shouldn't require a computer science degree.

name: Scop.ai
tagline: Generate task & model specific system prompts in seconds
description: Generate task & model specific AI system prompts for leading LLMs, browse over 200 tested prompt templates, and collaborate on prompts with team members through shared prompt collections.

name: Aonami Inc.
tagline: Control Tower for all enterprise business processes
description: Aonami - The Control Tower for Enterprise Automation. We offer a single unified platform, specialised for banking and healthcare. To run all SaaS tools, manage manual operations, and build business processes from a unified platform.

name: Wisile
tagline: AI Project Manager for Startups
description: Plan and execute your projects without the busywork! Wisile connects with your project stack, understands every data point, and assists you in executing and delivering projects faster, with confidence. Designed for CEO's, CTO's, Project & Product Managers.

name: Polipo Space
tagline: Build apps faster with ready-to-use react native screens
description: Accelerate your development with Polipo Space's ready to use React Native Screens. Includes authentication screens, paywalls, and more. Start building today!

name: IELTS Speaking
tagline: The app provides an AI coach to train for IELTS Speaking
description: IELTS Speaking AI Coach helps you practice real IELTS questions with AI feedback, track your progress, and improve fluency — all in one mobile app.

name: AIweb3Atlas
tagline: The All-in-One Directory for AI & Web3 Tools
description: AIweb3Atlas — One-stop AI & Web3 tools directory. We curate real productivity & innovation tools—not trading or token shill sites. Helping builders & investors connect and grow faster.

name: Context Idea
tagline: MCP Integrated Note App
description: A revolutionary note-taking app with MCP (Model Context Protocol) support, enabling seamless AI tool integration. Context Idea lets AI understand your ideas to support strategic success with next-generation memo capabilities.

name: Ulys Quest
tagline: A Global Treasure Hunting Engine Powered by Crypto Rewards.
description: Explore the world, earn crypto. 🌍 Ulys Quest is the first global treasure-hunting platform powered by NFTs and crypto rewards. 10,000+ real locations in 56 countries. Now launching its governance token — QUEST. Join the hunt! 🧭

name: SparkBuddy — Turn Your Idea Into Reality
tagline: Your personal startup accelerator mentor
description: SparkBuddy helps aspiring founders turn their ideas into real businesses. Generate business plans, validate your market, and launch step-by-step with AI guidance.
